definition: having or showing arrogant superiority to and disdain of those one views as unworthy
details:
adjective
- having or showing arrogant superiority to and disdain of those one views as unworthy
= example: having or showing arrogant superiority to and disdain of those one views as unworthy
= synonyms: swaggering
- expressing extreme contempt
= synonyms: contemptuous, insulting, scornful
